modName: Gold Trimmed and Blackened Bladed Imperial Sword
summary: A small, yet elegant change to the imperial sword. Personally, i thought the Imperial sword beared a strong relation to the Skyforge Steel Sword. I changed it in my game and thought i should share it to those who want it. Enjoy
descriptionHtml:
--==V1.1 RELEASE==--
New update! I have changed the sword to be a more realistic golden colour. Thanks nik0li for making me realise my mistake :D Also, people have requested a less glossy blade. If anyone can tell me how to edit the specular map, i will make the blade duller. Download file now available!!

A small, yet elegant change to the imperial sword. Personally, i thought the Imperial sword beared a strong relation to the Skyforge Steel Sword. I changed it in my game and thought i should share it to those who want it. Enjoy
author: Sakotius
